kw.name: Dado que eu acessei a URL para iniciar o teste
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Set Selenium Speed
kw.doc: Sets the delay that is waited after each Selenium command.

kw.name: Então eu realizo a validação de que todos os textos estão corretos
Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.

arguments.arg: Learn to Code Websites, Apps & Games

kw.msg: Verifying element 'XPath://div[1]//div[1]/div/div[1]/div[1]/div/h1' contains exact text 'Learn to Code Websites, Apps & Games'.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.

arguments.arg: Class aptent taciti sociosqu ad litora torquent per conubia nostra, per inceptos himenaeos. Sed molestie, velit ut eleifend sollicitudin, neque orci tempor nulla, id sagittis nisi ante nec arcu.

kw.msg: Verifying element 'XPath://*[@id="post-4816"]/div/div[1]/div/div[1]/div/div[1]/div[2]' contains exact text 'Class aptent taciti sociosqu ad litora torquent per conubia nostra, per inceptos himenaeos. Sed molestie, velit ut eleifend sollicitudin, neque orci tempor nulla, id sagittis nisi ante nec arcu.'.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
